column1: RT @TrumpWarRoom: Yahoo reporter apologizes to Riding Academy Stuff tooters fluting rubber coronavirus titties hinder blast in Oval Cans give pearls

Hope they're right, but Spanish flu had 2-3% case fatality rate (like COVID19) and 27% infection worldwide infection rate, and it it killed 30 million. *If* SARS-CoV-2 just as infectious, but only as deadly as seasonal flu (0.1%), that's still ~1 million dead.
